sentences.english: We must remain serene and calm, we have wasted points, but the race continues.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須保持平常心，我們丟分了，但競賽仍在繼續。

sentences.english: Calmly all, because you know the answer sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 平常心對待一切，因爲你早晚會知道答案。

sentences.english: We must treat them for an usual-heart.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須用一顆平常心來對待他們。

sentences.english: So we must have an ordinary psychology.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們必須有一顆平常心。

sentences.english: "The common mind is Dao"embodies a concentrated reflection of the Hongzhou Chan features.
sentences.chinese: “平常心是道”集中體現了洪州禪學思想特色。

sentences.english: To have balance in our lives, gives us a realistic view of the ups and downs of life.
sentences.chinese: 要擁有平衡，就得對生活中的榮辱起伏保持平常心。

sentences.english: You must have a normal and patience on the best way to encourage.
sentences.chinese: 你一定要有平常心和耐心，鼓勵就最好的方法。

sentences.english: The wisdom soul comes from ordinary heart.
Just go with our 'ordinary heart', and vexations will dimish.
sentences.chinese: 唯有以平常心過生活，煩惱纔會少。

sentences.english: We must stay calm and continue to work.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須保持平常心繼續比賽。

sentences.english: Face your failure with grace, and people will respect you even more for it.
sentences.chinese: 以平常心面對你的不如意，這樣別人會更加尊重你。

sentences.english: We should also have a normal attitude towards sports activities and sports competition.
sentences.chinese: 人們對體育運動和賽事也應有一顆平常心。

sentences.english: A cup of tea more normal ups and downs of life world.
sentences.chinese: 一杯茶品人生沉浮，平常心越萬千世界。

sentences.english: Great men don’t mind being little.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的人物都有一顆平常心。

sentences.english: But also the right to maintain a normal look at the success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 保持一顆平常心還要正確看待成敗得失。

sentences.english: Use ordinary mind to face unordinary circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 用平常心面對不平常之事。
